name: Farm Patronum
description:
Welcome! It is harvest season, and the crops are quite venerable! You're a scarecrow and the job of protecting them has fallen into your hands! All you have is a bottle of fertiliser, and your skills! Scurry around the crops, dash and spray the bugs and flies to kill them. Good luck!

Made for ludum dare, by MrChickenBoy. Everything was done by me, with an exception of music.

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to dash

Mouse to aim and shoot
